LanguageData.Penis.label: ペニス
LanguageData.Penis.description: A severed penis. It's average size, and that's fine. Nothing wrong with that at all. Really, it's OK. There's no shame in being average. It's just... you know... just average.
LanguageData.Micropenis.label: 極小ペニス
LanguageData.Micropenis.description:
A severed pinky.
Uh, no wait...
LanguageData.SmallPenis.label: 小さなペニス
LanguageData.SmallPenis.description: A severed penis. It's rather small, so I hope you've got a great severed personality.
LanguageData.BigPenis.label: 大きなペニス
LanguageData.HugePenis.label: 巨大なペニス
LanguageData.HorsePenis.label: 馬のペニス
LanguageData.HorsePenis.description: A severed horse penis from a centaur. Huge for a human.

LanguageData.PegDick.label: 人工ペニス
LanguageData.PegDick.description: A wooden dildo designed to replace a missing penis. Be careful of splinters.
LanguageData.HydraulicVagina.label: 人工膣
LanguageData.HydraulicVagina.description: A low-tech prosthetic vagina. Its cold metal grip is uncomfortable but it has great suction power.

LanguageData.HydraulicBreasts.description: Low-tech prosthetic breasts. Conical metal with increased pumping action, spray your friends.

LanguageData.BionicPenis.label: ハイテク人工ペニス
LanguageData.BionicPenis.description: A high-tech prosthetic penis. Features include: - ABSOLUTELY MASSIVE, this prosthetic is larger than any known natural penis, and is in fact the largest penile prosthetic permissible under federal law. - Over 50 different vibration modes, including 10 of the most stimulating waveforms known to science - State-of-the-art neural interface activates neural pathways you didn't even know you had to make you feel things you never even imagined
LanguageData.BionicVagina.label: ハイテク人工膣
LanguageData.BionicVagina.description: A high-tech prosthetic vagina. Features include: - Interior lined with 150 million micro-g-spots - Resizes to fit any penis - Auto-lubrication with boro-graphitic pseudofluid, smooth but never slimy (includes toggleable sliminess in case you're into that) - SenseID technology identifies the man you're fucking, automatically adds him on Facebook, and contacts his mother introducing you as his new girlfriend.
LanguageData.BionicBreasts.label: ハイテク義胸
LanguageData.BionicBreasts.description: High-tech prosthetic breasts. Features include: - Resizes to any desired size
LanguageData.BionicAnus.label: ハイテク人工肛門
LanguageData.BionicAnus.description: A high-tech prosthetic anus. Features include: - Resizes to fit any penis - Auto-lubrication with boro-graphitic pseudofluid, smooth but never slimy (includes toggleable sliminess in case you're into that)
